data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Iwatsuki, Yukio, Al-Mamry, Juma M., Heemstra, Phillip C. (2016): Validity of a blue stripe snapper, Lutjanus octolineatus (Cuvier 1828) and a related species, L. bengalensis (Bloch 1790) with a new species (Pisces, Lutjanidae) from the Arabian Sea. Zootaxa 4098 (3): 511-528, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4098.3.5
